name: Randy Goebel
content: R.G. (Randy) Goebel R.G. (Randy) Goebel Professor Department of Computing Science 2-21 Athabasca Hall University of Alberta Edmonton, Alberta Canada T6G 2H1 E-mail: goebel@cs.ualberta.ca Voice: +1 (780) 492-2683 Facsimile: +1 (780) 492-1071 WWW: http://www.cs.ualberta.ca/~goebel Education B.Sc. Computer Science, 1974, University of Regina M.Sc. Computing Science, 1977, University of Alberta Ph.D. Computer Science, 1985, University of British Columbia. Research interests My interests are in knowledge representation, logic-based non-deductive reasoning, machine learning, visualization, belief revision, systems biology, and and computational linguistics See a variety of research project descriptions at Alberta Ingenuity Centre for Machine Learning Other things that I try to maintain ... Favourite phrases
